project.name: |-- 002-manipulating-collections-java8
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + filter, map, limit, collect, sorted
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates some of the capabilities of Java 8 streams.
StreamsRunner: Illustrate how to leverage Streams to: + return a list with the name of dishes of a menu which are low caloric dishes. + return a list with the name of the top 3 most caloric dishes.
